examples.korean: He convinced us of his fitness for the task. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 자기가 그 일에 적합함을 우리에게 납득시켰다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: She utterly failed to convince them. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 그들을 납득시키는 데 완전히 실패했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She utterly failed to convince them. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Her explanation did not satisfy the teacher. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀의 해명은 선생님을 납득시키지 못했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Her explanation did not satisfy the teacher. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I find it impossible to get through to her. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 그녀를 납득시키는 것이 불가능하다고 본다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I find it impossible to get through to her. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I remain unconvinced of the need for change. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 변화[변경]의 필요성에 대해 여전히 납득이 안 된다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
